gen:link.msg:message: The reported value SHOULD be used with the measure equal to the fact reported for `DocumentPresentationCurrency`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_AllMeasureEqualToReportedValue1_DocumentPresentationCurrency')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_AllMeasureEqualToReportedValue1_DocumentPresentationCurrency return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_AllMeasureEqualToReportedValue1_AllMonetaryItems')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_AllMeasureEqualToReportedValue1_AllMonetaryItems return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DocumentResubmissionDueToTechnicalAndOrProcesRelatedInaccuraciesExplanation` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `DocumentResubmissionDueToTechnicalAndOrProcesRelatedInaccuracies` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnExistence1_DocumentResubmissionDueToTechnicalAndOrProcesRelatedInaccuracies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnExistence1_DocumentResubmissionDueToTechnicalAndOrProcesRelatedInaccuracies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DocumentResubmissionDueToUnsurmountableInaccuraciesExplanation` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `DocumentResubmissionDueToUnsurmountableInaccuracies` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnExistence2_DocumentResubmissionDueToUnsurmountableInaccuracies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnExistence2_DocumentResubmissionDueToUnsurmountableInaccuracies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
